org.apache.fineract.batch.service

Class ResolutionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.batch.service.ResolutionHelper

  • @Component
public class ResolutionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to create dependency map among the various batchRequests. It also provides method that takes care of dependency resolution among related requests.
    Author:
    Rishabh Shukla
    See Also:
    BatchApiServiceImpl

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ResolutionHelper.BatchRequestNode
      Provides a Node like object for the request tree.

    • Method Detail

      • getDependingRequests

        public java.util.List<ResolutionHelper.BatchRequestNode> getDependingRequests(java.util.List<BatchRequest> batchRequests)
        Returns a map containing requests that are divided in accordance of dependency relations among them. Each different list is identified with a "Key" which is the "requestId" of the request at topmost level in dependency hierarchy of that particular list.
        Parameters:
        batchRequests -
        Returns:
        List>

      • resoluteRequest

        public BatchRequest resoluteRequest(BatchRequest request,
                                    BatchResponse parentResponse)
        Returns a BatchRequest after dependency resolution. It takes a request and the response of the request it is dependent upon as its arguments and change the body or relativeUrl of the request according to parent Request.
        Parameters:
        request -
        lastResponse -
        Returns:
        BatchRequest
